decisions.rationale: Iron condor on SPY to collect premium in range-bound market. Max profit $1.50 credit x 5 contracts = $750 if SPY stays between $550-$590 at expiration. Max loss limited to $3.50 x 5 = $1,750 on either wing. Probability of profit ~65% based on current IV and delta.

plan_rationale: Iron condor premium collection: SPY has been range-bound for 2 weeks between $555-$585. IV rank at 45th percentile - decent premium available. Defined risk spread with ~2:1 reward-to-risk on premium collected vs max loss per wing.
